alert.note: Alert for Walker; Whitfield (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 3:49PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Whitfield and southeastern Walker Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 349 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Lafayette, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Dalton, Lafayette, Naomi, Mill Creek, Suttles Mill, Noble, Villanow and Rocky Face. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
